name: MY BONE! ARE READY! TO HATCH!
name_original: MY BONE! ARE READY! TO HATCH!
description:
Your bones are filled to bursting with wriggly little things some would call flesh-eating parasites. You call them your babies. Unfortunately, they still need to eat flesh. Also unfortunately, you're a skeleton. Somewhat lacking in the flesh department.

But there is someone who could help.

Convince your roommate to allow the worms in your head to eat him alive.

Thank you.

My first game of any kind, short and hopefully sweet. Enjoy!

Inspired by David Schirduan's magnificent RPG death supplement, "My Bones are Ready to Hatch!" Check out his website at https://www.technicalgrimoire.com/.
